StringTable.Label: SterileWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A planet hostile to all life, but great for running controlled experiments.

StringTable.Label: FertileWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: A planet that can feed an Empire.

StringTable.Label: TranquilWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Will eventually be taken over by retirees.

StringTable.Label: VolcanicWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Abundant power is nice, but boy do the earthquakes get old.

StringTable.Label: FissuredWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Hostile on the surface, but with fertile fissures and abundant natural resources to mine.

StringTable.Label: BombardedWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: Mostly land full of Calderas of water, and abundant geothermal energy.
